sen.j: 大道寺氏（だいどうじし）は日本の氏族の一つ。
sen.e: The Daidoji clan is one of the Japanese clans.
The Daidoji clan is one of the Japanese clans.
The Daidoji clan is one of the Japanese clans.

sen.j: 現在の京都府綴喜郡宇治田原町の大導寺が発祥と思われる。
sen.e: Its origin is considered to be Daido-ji Temple of present Ujitawara-cho, Tsuzuki County, Kyoto Prefecture.
Its origin is considered to be Daido-ji Temple of present Ujitawara-cho, Tsuzuki County, Kyoto Prefecture.
Its origin is considered to be Daido-ji Temple of present Ujitawara-cho, Tsuzuki County, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 大導寺家は京都千本釈迦堂へ移住したとされている。
sen.e: The Daidoji family was believed to moved to Senbon Shaka-do Temple of Kyoto.
The Daidoji family was believed to have moved to Senbon Shaka-do Temple of Kyoto.
The Daidoji family was believed to have moved to Senbon Shaka-do Temple of Kyoto.

sen.j: 尾張藩に仕えた大道寺氏は、元々は後北条氏の家臣である。
sen.e: The Daidoji clan who had served the Owari domain was originally a vassal of a Gohojo clan.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Daidoji clan who had served the Owari domain was originally a vassal of a Gohojo clan.
The Daidoji clan who had served the Owari domain was originally a vassal of the Gohojo clan.

sen.j: 川越城将を勤め18万石を治めた大道寺政繁の次男大道寺重直が、北条氏滅亡後に加賀国前田氏を経て松平忠吉に2000石で仕えたのに始まる。
sen.e: After the fall of the Hojo clan, Shigenao DAIDOJI, the second son of Masashige DAIDOJI who worked as the top of Kawagoe-jo Castle and governed 180 thousand Goku crop yields, served Maeda clan of Kaga and then began to serve Tadayoshi MATSUDAIRA at two thousand Goku crop yields.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: After the fall of the Hojo clan, Shigenao DAIDOJI, the second son of Masashige DAIDOJI who worked as the top at Kawagoe-jo Castle and governed 180 thousand Goku crop yields, served the Maeda clan of Kaga and then began to serve Tadayoshi MATSUDAIRA with two thousand Goku crop yields.

After the fall of the Hojo clan, Shigenao DAIDOJI, the second son of Masashige DAIDOJI who worked as the top at Kawagoe-jo Castle and governed 180 thousand koku crop yields, served the Maeda clan of Kaga Province and then began to serve Tadayoshi MATSUDAIRA with two thousand Goku crop yields.
sen.cmt: Goku→kokuに修正しました。また、Kaga→Kaga Provinceとしました。

sen.j: 松平忠吉は徳川家康の四男で尾張４９万石を与えられていた。
sen.e: Tadayoshi MATSUDAIRA was the fourth son of Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and had been given 490 thousand Goku crop yields in Owari.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Tadayoshi MATSUDAIRA was the fourth son of Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and had been given 490 thousand Goku crop yields in Owari.
Tadayoshi MATSUDAIRA was the fourth son of Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and had been given 490 thousand koku crop yields in Owari Province.
sen.cmt: Goku→kokuに修正しました。Owari→Owari Provinceとしました。

sen.j: 忠吉時代の居城は清須にあり重直の屋敷跡周辺は今も清須市清洲町字大道寺という。
sen.e: When Shigenao served Tadayoshi, he lived in the castle in Kiyosu, and vicinity of the site of his residence is still called Aza Daidoji, Kiyosu-machi, Kiyosu City, Aichi Prefecture.
When Shigenao served Tadayoshi, he lived in the castle in Kiyosu, and in the vicinity of the site of his residence is still called Aza Daidoji, Kiyosu-machi, Kiyosu City, Aichi Prefecture.
When Shigenao served Tadayoshi, he lived in the castle in Kiyosu, and in the vicinity of the site of his residence is still called Aza Daidoji, Kiyosu-machi, Kiyosu City, Aichi Prefecture.

sen.j: 忠吉死後、尾張は家康九男徳川義直に与えられたが、重直は引き続き義直に仕える。
sen.e: After Tadayoshi death, although Owari was given to Ieyasu's ninth son Yoshinao TOKUGAWA, Shigenao continuously served Yoshinao.
After Tadayoshi death, although Owari was given to Ieyasu's ninth son Yoshinao TOKUGAWA, Shigenao continuously served Yoshinao.
After Tadayoshi's death, although Owari was given to Ieyasu's ninth son Yoshinao TOKUGAWA, Shigenao continuously served Yoshinao.

sen.j: 大坂の役を経て500石が加増され都合2500石となる。
sen.e: After Osaka no Jin (The Siege of Osaka), 500 Goku crop yields were added, and he had 2500 Goku in all.
After Osaka no Jin (The Siege of Osaka), 500 Goku crop yields were added, and he had 2500 Goku in all.
After the Siege of Osaka, 500 koku crop yields were added, and he had 2500 koku in all.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペースを削除、および"Osaka no Jin"を削除しました(本文の「大坂の役」など他の言い方があるため)。Goku→kokuに修正しました。
